results.title: [A case of Rabson-Mendenhall syndrome treated with empagliflozin combined with metformin].
results.text_hl: [A case of @<m>DISEASE_Donohue_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056731 @@@Rabson-Mendenhall syndrome@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_empagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C570240 @@@empagliflozin@@@ combined with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@].

results.title: Use of a Sodium-Glucose Cotransporter 2 Inhibitor, Empagliflozin, in a Patient with Rabson-Mendenhall Syndrome.
results.text_hl: CASE PRESENTATION: We report a case of an 11-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ who was diagnosed with @<m>DISEASE_Donohue_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056731 @@@RMS@@@ at 6 years of age, confirmed through genetic sequencing, with unsatisfactory glycemic control despite the use of >5 IU/kg/day of @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@pioglitazone@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Dos Santos SS, Ramaldes LA, Gabbay MAL, Moises RCS, Dib SA. Use of a Sodium-Glucose Cotransporter 2 Inhibitor, Empagliflozin, in a Patient with Rabson-Mendenhall Syndrome. Horm Res Paediatr. 2021;94(7-8):313-316. PMID: 34551418
citations.BibTeX: @article{34551418, title={Use of a Sodium-Glucose Cotransporter 2 Inhibitor, Empagliflozin, in a Patient with Rabson-Mendenhall Syndrome.}, author={Dos Santos SS and Ramaldes LA and Gabbay MAL and Moises RCS and Dib SA}, journal={Horm Res Paediatr}, volume={94}, number={7-8}, pages={313-316}}

results.title: SGLT2i Improves Glycemic Control in Patients With Congenital Severe Insulin Resistance.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@Insulin-resistant diabetes@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Donohue_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056731 @@@Rabson-Mendenhall syndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Donohue_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056731 @@@RMS@@@) is relatively unresponsive to first-line antidiabetic treatments, including @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@.

citations.NLM: Galderisi A, Tamborlane W, Taylor SI, Attia N, Moretti C, Barbetti F. SGLT2i Improves Glycemic Control in Patients With Congenital Severe Insulin Resistance. Pediatrics. 2022 Jul 1;150(1):. PMID: 35652305

results.title: A case of Donohue syndrome "Leprechaunism" with a novel mutation in the insulin receptor gene.
results.text_hl: She was diagnosed as having @<m>DISEASE_Donohue_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056731 @@@Donohue syndrome@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and continuous nasogastric feeding were administrated.
